author: A Correspondent
title: Coronavirus | Youth held for spreading fake information on COVID-19 in Tripura
description: No positive case detected in the State on Sunday, says Chief Minister
content:
The Tripura police on Sunday arrested a youth for allegedly spreading fake news on the novel coronavirus situation in the State. They claimed he was posting false or fabricated information over reported detection of positive cases.
